record.description: [University of Chicago Track Team, 1900:] Z. R. Pettet, A. A. Stagg (coach), W. J. Schmal, T. J. Lister, H. B. Conibear (trainer), H. H. Lord, D. P. Trude, D. R. Richberg, H. B. Slack, C. R. Manning, T. W. Mortimer, E. D. K. Lettingwell, F. M. Horton, G. G. Davis, F. G. Moloney, C. V. Brown, W. A. Moloney, and C. E. Hulbert (captain).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on board, two duplicate copies mounted on board.
